articles.description: Former South Carolina stars Aliyah Boston and A'ja Wilson were named 2023 WNBA All-Stars, the first time the Gamecocks have had two alumni selected.
articles.content: COLUMBIA Former South Carolina women's basketball stars Aliyah Boston and A'ja Wilson on Sunday were named starters for the 2023 WNBA All-Star game. The Gamecocks are one of just two college programs… [+2000 chars]
